COOPERATION.ADVANTAGES: What are the advantages of working with OZODA SHOWROOM?
COOPERATION.ADVANTAGES_INFO: Every detail was combined with the tweed fabric, all the elements up to the stones were brought from the UAE, and this amazing outfit will delight every woman.
COOPERATION.ORDERS_FROM: All fabrics and stones used in the OZODA SHOWROOM atelier were brought from Turkey and the United Arab Emirates.
COOPERATION.ORDERS_QUALITY: All our outfits meet premium quality, exclusivity of styles and are made in Uzbekistan.
COOPERATION.WORK_TOGETHER_INFO: You can request a partnership or exclusive order here
COOPERATION.WORK_TOGETHER_SUBMIT: By clicking the submit button, you agree to the privacy and security terms
COOPERATION.NEWSLETTER_ADD: Be the first to get the latest news about trends, promotions and much more!
COOPERATION.NEWSLETTER_EMAIL: I have been able to read and understand the information on the use of my personal data explained in the Privacy and Policy and agree to receive customised commercial communications from BERSHKA via email and other means
COOPERATION.ABOUT_NAME: OZODA ISKHAKOVA founder and designer of Ozoda Showroom is one of the best, talented and sought-after designers in Uzbekistan. Ozoda began her activities in this area in 2004. In 2011-2012 took part in the project Tashshabus. In 2013 participated with a new collection in the Tuilar Muborak project. In 2016, Ozoda took part in the Russian Fashion show and won a prize, Ozoda's Oriental Charm collection was highly ranked among the main representatives of prestige by Vyacheslav Cheslav Zaitsev and fashion expert Burmatikov, Andrea also went to improve her qualifications at the AICP Fashion Academy in the same year in Paris and at the consulate participated in a fashion show. She took part in the fashion week in Azerbaijan Baku Fashion Week. Ozoda Iskhakova observed active participation in new collections at International competitions and fashion shows, as well as at fashion events held in Uzbekistan. IDFW Ozoda Iskhakova presented two collections. The first Pret-a-porte collection called Velvet is designed using leather, as well as allo bakhmal and velvet fabrics. The second collection called Oriental charm is designed using interior elements and fabrics of adras, gas and coracle. In 2020, in New York, a video meeting of more than 100 designers from all over the world was broadcast on the Internet, including our brand Ozoda showroom.
COOPERATION.SUCCESS: In 2017, she took part in the Azerbaijan Fashion Week Baku fashion week In 2018, she studied at the advanced training courses at the AICP Fashion Academy in Paris; In 2018, participation in AFWU Istanbul Fashion Week; In 2019, participation in AFWU Fashion Week in Cappadocia; 2021 participation in the IDFW International Fashion Week in the USA - online 2021 April - participation in Aspara Fashion Week - online Ozoda Iskhakova regularly takes an active part with new collections at International competitions and fashion shows, as well as at fashion events held in Uzbekistan.
COOPERATION.GUIPURE_TEXT: This elegant outfit, which has a guipure fabric and a modest detail in the collar.
